meanings.definition: Try hard to do or achieve something.
meanings.sent1: She was endeavouring to finish her homework before dinner.
meanings.sent2: He is always endeavouring to improve his basketball skills.
meanings.sent3: The cat was endeavouring to catch the elusive red dot on the wall.
meanings.sent4: The young artist was endeavouring to capture the beauty of the sunset in her painting.
meanings.sent5: The determined ant was endeavouring to carry a piece of food much larger than itself back to the colony.

meanings.definition: Make an effort to achieve a goal.
meanings.sent1: The students were endeavouring to raise enough money for their class trip.
meanings.sent2: She is currently endeavouring to save up for a new car.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was endeavouring to reach the bird feeder hanging just out of its reach.
meanings.sent4: The team was endeavouring to win the championship for the first time in decades.
meanings.sent5: The little boy was endeavouring to reach the cookie jar on the top shelf.
